thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: U.S. FDA Alerts Not To Use Products Made By Cantrell Drug Company

author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. FDA Alerts Not To Use Products Made By Cantrell Drug Company
text:
March 1 (Reuters) -
* U.S. FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION SAYS IS ALERTING HEALTH CARE PROFESSIONALS AND PATIENTS NOT TO USE DRUG PRODUCTS PRODUCED BY CANTRELL DRUG COMPANY
* U.S. FDA SAYS“IS CONCERNED ABOUT SERIOUS DEFICIENCIES” IN CANTRELL DRUG CO’S COMPOUNDING OPERATIONS
* U.S. FDA SAYS PROPOSED ORDER AGAINST CANTRELL DRUG CO ALSO WILL REQUIRE CANTRELL TO RECALL ALL NON-EXPIRED DRUG PRODUCTS ON THE MARKET
* U.S. FDA SAYS IS NOT YET AWARE OF REPORTS OF ILLNESS ASSOCIATED WITH THE USE OF CANTRELL DRUG CO’S PRODUCTS [U.S. Food and Drug Administration]
